amendments shall be made: in the Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) (Production 1948), the Federal Government is pleased to direct that the following furtherii, In exercise of the powers conferred by section 2 of the Regulation of Mines

In the aforesaid Rules,- " 
in rule 2, for clause (i) the following shall be substituted. namely:- 
(I) 
(325) 
Price : Rs. 2.00 akigtan 
326 	THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., JUNE 20, 2009 PAHF II 
"0) "sale price" means the maximum price of CNG which a licensee 
shall charge from the consumer as notified by the Authority from time . 	to time:" and 
(2) 	for rule 13. the following shall be substituted, namely:- 
"13. Price of CNG to be sold. - (1) The Authority shall determine and 
notify the sale price in accordance with the policy guidelines issued by 
the Federal Government. from time to time. 
(2) 	No licensee shall charge a price from its consumer, which is higher 
than the sale notified by the Authority, from lime to time". 
[No. 4/2/2008-RA-11/0GRAI 
MANZOOR AHMAD,
